summary: Two fragments of a Gallican Psalter with occasional readings from the Romanum, with continuous interlinear Old English glosses, known as C1 and C2. The fragments are from Pss. 7317- 743 and Ps. 7731-43. Fragments from the same manuscript are Haarlem, Stadsbibliotheek 188 fol. 53 and Sondershausen, Schlossmuseum, Hs Br. 1. Place of production unknown.

admin: Described by Hollie Morgan and Owen Roberson with the assistance of Sanne van der Schee, with reference to published scholarship; ed. by Takako Kato (2010; 2013).
